path.description: The path at which the Helm values file can be found.

images.description: A list of images which should receive updates.

image.description: The container image (without tag) at which the update is targeted.

key.description: The key in the Helm values file of which the value needs to be updated. For nested values, it takes a YAML dot notation path.

value.description: Specifies the new value for the specified key in the Helm values file.
